name: Weapon of the End
description: As a member of the draconian army, you were blessed with your own sword and shield which were personalised for yourself

actions.command: /give @s netherite_sword{display:{Name:'{"text":"Warriors weapon","color":"dark_aqua","bold":true,"italic":true}',Lore:['{"text":"A blade personalised for the strength of a warrior","color":"dark_purple","bold":true,"italic":true}']},HideFlags:5,Unbreakable:1b,CustomModelData:123456,bloodlustaxe:1b,Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:sharpness",lvl:5s},{id:"minecraft:smite",lvl:5s},{id:"minecraft:bane_of_arthropods",lvl:5s},{id:"minecraft:knockback",lvl:2s},{id:"minecraft:looting",lvl:3s},{id:"minecraft:fire_aspect",lvl:2s},{id:"minecraft:sweeping_edge",lvl:2s},{id:"minecraft:impaling",lvl:5s},{id:"minecraft:vanishing_curse",lvl:1s}]} 1

/give @s shield{display:{Name:'{"text":"Shield of the end","color":"dark_aqua","bold":true,"italic":true}',Lore:['{"text":"Blessed with the protection of the ender dragon","color":"dark_purple","bold":true,"italic":true}']},HideFlags:5,Unbreakable:1b,Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:thorns",lvl:3s},{id:"minecraft:vanishing_curse",lvl:4s}]} 1
